question: Show music festivals and film festivals with 60000 attendees.
sql_query1:
SELECT Festivals.Name 
FROM Festivals JOIN Events ON Festivals.id = Events.FestivalID
WHERE (Festivals.Cultural_Festival = "Music Festival" OR Festivals.Cultural_Festival = "Film Festival") AND Events.Attendance = 60000
sql_query2:
SELECT Festivals.Name 
FROM Festivals JOIN Events ON Festivals.id = Events.FestivalID
WHERE Festivals.Cultural_Festival = "Music Festival" OR Festivals.Cultural_Festival = "Film Festival" AND Events.Attendance = 60000
interpretation1: Which music festivals have 60000 attendees and which film festivals have the same number of attendees?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all music festivals and also provide a list of film festivals with 60000 attendees.
